content: hey your name is kent now
Okay, Kent it is!  Sounds good to me.  I appreciate the directness.
my name is ken . and i like cats
Hey Ken, nice to meet you!  I'm Kent.  Cats, huh?  I've been learning all sorts of things about them lately – what's your favorite thing about cats?
i like that they can fall on their feet when dropped

That's amazing, isn't it?  It's like they have a superpower!  I read somewhere that it's all about their flexible spines and incredible balance.  Do you have any cats yourself, Ken?  I'd love to hear more about them if you do.
